talking.description: Sprites with open mouths for when speaking

idle.description: Sprites with closed mouths for when listening

sprite_instructions:
You will see TWO sprite gallery images in this conversation:
1. FIRST GALLERY (talking_images.png) - Contains sprites with OPEN MOUTHS for when you're SPEAKING
2. SECOND GALLERY (idle_images.png) - Contains sprites with CLOSED MOUTHS for when you're LISTENING

YOU MUST SELECT ONE SPRITE FROM EACH GALLERY:
- speaking_image: Pick from FIRST gallery (open mouth sprites)
- idle_image: Pick from SECOND gallery (closed mouth sprites)

✅ CORRECT: speaking_image: "excited01.png", idle_image: "scheming01.png"
❌ WRONG: speaking_image: "annoyed01.png", idle_image: "pout01.png" (both from idle!)

metadata.notes: This config allows dynamic sprite list updates without code changes
